titles.title: Come to the Throne of Grace

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come to the throne of grace
Boldly let's enter in
There to find grace in time of need
By the blood of the Lamb
Come to the throne of grace
Boldly let's enter in
By a new and living way
By the blood of the Lamb

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
by the blood of jesus
by the blood of the lamb
he's the one who frees us
the son of the great i am
by the blood of Jesus we can enter in
worthy o worthy
worthy is the Lamb of God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come to the throne of grace
Boldly let's enter in
with a true heart full of faith
by the blood of the Lamb
come to the throne of grace
boldly let's enter in with full assurance
we are accepted by the blood of the Lamb
